tooltip.logicchips.and_gate: §fThe §eAND Chip §fgives only an Output, when in all inputs have a signal
tooltip.logicchips.nand_gate: §fThe §eNAND Chip §fgives an Output, as long not all inputs have a signal
tooltip.logicchips.or_gate: §fThe §eOR Chip §fgives an Output, as long there is anywere a input signal
tooltip.logicchips.nor_gate: §fThe §eNOR Chip §fgives an Output, when there is no input signal
tooltip.logicchips.xor_gate: §fThe §eXOR Chip §fgives an Output, only when the total inputs signals is an odd number
tooltip.logicchips.xnor_gate: §fThe §eXNOR Chip §fgives an Output, only when the total inputs signals is an even number
tooltip.logicchips.and_gate_3: §fThe §eAND Chip §fgives only an Output, when in all inputs have a signal
tooltip.logicchips.nand_gate_3: §fThe §eNAND Chip §fgives an Output, as long not all inputs have a signal
tooltip.logicchips.or_gate_3: §fThe §eOR Chip §fgives an Output, as long there is anywere a input signal
tooltip.logicchips.nor_gate_3: §fThe §eNOR Chip §fgives an Output, when there is no input signal
tooltip.logicchips.xor_gate_3: §fThe §eXOR Chip §fgives an Output, only when the total input signals is an odd number
tooltip.logicchips.xnor_gate_3: §fThe §eXNOR Chip §fgives an Output, only when the total input signals is an even number
